channel.title: Tag: bioware - blog.lmorchard.com
channel.description: It's all spinning wheels & self-doubt until the first pot of coffee.

item.title: Mass Effect 2: A Review
item.description: <html><head></head><body>I just finished Bioware's Mass Effect 2 for Xbox 360, and I've got some thoughts about it. Haven't really written reviews here for games before, but I said I wanted to start posting things here that I'd want to read. So, here goes... In a nutshell: I loved it, will play it againâ€”but it could have been so much better.</body></html>
